TC.Description: To Verify the presence of Renewal tab in Policy Header
To verify the fields available in Renewal tab
To verify the value of renewal date field should duplicate the value in Basic details
Verify the 'Main Tab' in policy header section page in Broker mode
Verify the 'Traded Type' field is in READ ONLY in Broker mode
Verify the 'Lead Insurer (populated from quote data)' field is mandatory during Buy process in Broker model
Verify 'Policy Balance','Balance inc. unsettled PF/SA' fields are in READ ONLY mode in Broker mode
Verify 'Risk Transfer' and 'Cascading Risk Transfer' fields are show/hide based on Insurer configuration
Verify the 'Business Type' Field is Mandatory in Broker mode
Verify the 'Business Source' Field is prepopulated in Broker mode
Verify that 'department' and 'sub team' fields are manually populated by broker in Broker mode
Verify the listed 32 fields are Available in Broker mode
Verify the 'Analysis Code' Field is prepopulated in Insurer mode
Verify the 'Main Tab' in policy header section page in Insurer mode
Verify the listed 29 fields are Available in Insurer mode
Verify Compliance tab is diplayed in policy header page
Verify all fields are available in Complaince and ETOL tab
Verify mandatory fields are available in Complaince and ETOL tab
Verify error message is displayed for Mandatory fields while saving quote
Verify error message is displayed for Mandatory for buy fields while buying quote
Verify whether Term related fields are enable for editing when Terms Agreed is set as No
Verify whether Date error field are enable for editing when policy document is set as False
Verify if fields in the ETOL are enabled when ETOL Required flag is set as false
Verify ETOL tab is present in Policy header
Verify policy holder name, employer name and dummy policy is mandatory ETOL required flag is set as true
Verify Employer's reference name is mandatory ERN exempt is set as false
